page.title: 17Books and Ballads.
page.content: The Whisky Roads of Scotland: section on Glenbuchat. Glenbuchat Yesterdays: Book of Photos.The Book of Glenbuchat: Various articles by Dr.Simpson. Epitaphs & Inscriptions of Aberdeenshire: Interesting sections on Glenbuchat,Towie & Glenkindie. Five poems by George Hay of Glenbuchat. Old Glenbuchat of Jacobite Fame.The Lochmaben Harper:Glenkindie Ballad. Jean of Bethelnie:Glenbuchat-home of Gordon.Edom o'Gordon:Border ballad by Percy & Bell(Burning of Towie Castle.) Eppie Morrie:The Battle of Alford. The Earl of Mar's Daughter:Kildrummy. Cabrach Roy's Wife of Aldivalloch:by J.Skinner.John o' Badenyond:by A.McGlashen,printed in 1786-Glenbuchat 1786-Glenbuchat.Culloden:by J.Prebble. Bonnie Prince Charlie:by M.McLaren.
